analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x06e0feb0d74106c7ada8497754074d222ec6bcdf.sol:
	Contract BitBall has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x06e0feb0d74106c7ada8497754074d222ec6bcdf.sol#192-193)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x06e0feb0d74106c7ada8497754074d222ec6bcdf.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x06e0feb0d74106c7ada8497754074d222ec6bcdf.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x06e0feb0d74106c7ada8497754074d222ec6bcdf.sol#66-68) is not in mixedCase
